test.description: Check default field values for new user registration

basestate.description: Using an open web browser, navigate to the Home page.

subtest.description: Select Register from the main menu

step.description: Ensure the "Home" page is displayed in the browser.
Ensure the "Register" page is displayed in the browser.
Obtain the value currently displayed in the "Title" field.
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
Obtain the text currently displayed in the "Name" field.
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
Obtain the current value of the "Male" radio button. (Record a value of "1" if it is selected or "0" if not selected)
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
Obtain the current value of the "Female" radio button. (Record a value of "1" if it is selected or "0" if not selected)
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
Obtain the text currently displayed in the "DOB" field.
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
Obtain the text currently displayed in the "Email" field.
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
Obtain the current value of the "MailingList" checkbox. (Record a value of "1" if it is selected or "0" if not selected)
Check the obtained value matches the expected value
